attributes.name: Adult School Figures - Tuesdays 5:30pm
attributes.description:
PLEASE NOTE: this is not a Beginner class. Must be comfortable with basic gliding, 1 foot glides, and stopping. 

Figures are a discipline in skating that requires the skater to learn edges and turns on circles. They help the skater immensely with body alignment, edges and turns, required in all disciplines of figure skating.
